item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, December 11, 2024 at 5:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. PeerTube mobile app: discover videos while caring for your attention (121 points | 56 comments)
2. Gemini 2.0: our new AI model for the agentic era (231 points | 104 comments)
3. RISC-V HiFive Premier P550 Development Boards with Ubuntu Now Available (23 points | 2 comments)

5. Making memcpy(NULL, NULL, 0) well-defined (142 points | 108 comments)
6. Charge Robotics (YC S21) is hiring MechEs to build robots that build solar farms ( | hide)
7. Helium: Lighter Web Automation with Python (92 points | 30 comments)
8. Pgroll – Zero-downtime, reversible, schema changes for PostgreSQL (new website) (10 points | 1 comment)
9. Django and Postgres for the Busy Rails Developer (18 points | discuss)
10. Judge Refuses to Allow Sale of Infowars to The Onion (343 points | 430 comments)
11. Bi-elliptic transfer orbit maneuver (32 points | 17 comments)
12. Don't Get Distracted (122 points | 68 comments)
13. Machine Learning-Driven Static Profiling for GraalVM Native Image (18 points | 1 comment)
14. Overweight overtakes tobacco smoking as the leading disease risk factor in 2024 (13 points | 2 comments)
15. The GPU is not always faster (20 points | 16 comments)
16. Understanding the Odin Programming Language (84 points | 33 comments)
17. Phantom Vibrations of a Lost Smartphone (19 points | 1 comment)
18. From where I left (1107 points | 407 comments)
19. WhatsApp for Business Changed the World (16 points | 23 comments)
20. The Myth of Bananaland: The Marketing and Reality of the United Fruit Company (51 points | 41 comments)
21. GM exits robotaxi market, will bring Cruise operations in house (359 points | 538 comments)
22. We all took the DVD boom era for granted (108 points | 193 comments)
23. Gah – CLI to install software from GitHub Releases (15 points | 10 comments)
24. Evolving my ergonomic setup (or, my laptop with extra steps) (74 points | 36 comments)
25. Electric (Postgres sync engine) beta release (275 points | 52 comments)
26. The Case Against Google's Claims of "Quantum Supremacy" (110 points | 71 comments)
27. Launch HN: Double (YC W24) – Index Investing with 0% Expense Ratios (395 points | 391 comments)
28. You need 4 colors (100 points | 81 comments)
29. What I learned covering computer science in 2024 (105 points | 10 comments)
30. One of the last Navajo code-talkers died on October 19th, aged 107 (239 points | 98 comments)
